name: Chorus.js
details: Chorus.js offers a very simple way to orchestrate asynchronous and synchronous APIs in Node applications stack. Our focusu0026nbsp;is on making chorus.js super easy to learn and use everywhere, from an entry-level Raspberry Pi to the most scalable PaaS, and anything in between.

name: Singly Hallway
details: This is an open source project to help developers build amazing applications combining data from many sources easily, through one API. This codebase is currently live and poweringu0026nbsp;api.singly.comu0026nbsp;so sign in and start building!
